sentences.en: A gust of wind pried loose a section of sheet-metal roofing.
sentences.cn: 一阵狂风把铺在屋顶上的一块金属片掀起来了。

sentences.en: a loose floorboard
sentences.cn: 松动的地板

sentences.en: a loose interpretation of the law
sentences.cn: 对法律不严谨的解释

sentences.en: a loose sweatshirt
sentences.cn: 宽松的运动衫

sentences.en: a loose translation
sentences.cn: 不精确的译文

sentences.en: A page came loose and floated onto the tiles.
sentences.cn: 有一页纸脱落下来，飘落到地砖上。

sentences.en: And now the anger Maggie had feared was loosed.
sentences.cn: 现在，玛吉所害怕的怒火发泄出来了。

sentences.en: Good listeners even sit in an open way: relaxed, arms loose.
sentences.cn: 善于倾听的人甚至坐姿也很坦荡端正：身体放松，双臂自然下垂。

sentences.en: hang loose, baby!.
sentences.cn: 放松点儿，宝贝儿！。

sentences.en: He despised loose thinking.
sentences.cn: 他鄙视不严谨的思维。

sentences.en: He's cut loose from this business except, possibly, where James is concerned.
sentences.cn: 可能除了詹姆斯外，公司里都没人能管得了他。

sentences.en: Loose-fitting shirts are comfy.
sentences.cn: 宽松的衬衫很舒服。

sentences.en: She broke loose from his embrace and crossed to the window.
sentences.cn: 她从他怀抱里挣脱出来，走到窗前。

sentences.en: She gathered loose soil and let it filter slowly through her fingers.
sentences.cn: 她捧起疏松的泥土，任其缓缓地从指间漏下。

sentences.en: She idly pulled at a loose thread on her skirt.
sentences.cn: 她无聊地扯着裙子上一根松掉的线头。

sentences.en: She unbound her hair and let it flow loose in the wind.
sentences.cn: 她把头发解开，让它随风飘动。

sentences.en: Stick down any loose bits of flooring.
sentences.cn: 把松动的地板块都粘好。

sentences.en: The screw has come loose (= become loose ) .
sentences.cn: 螺丝松了。

sentences.en: Thieves ransacked the office, taking a sack of loose change.
sentences.cn: 窃贼洗劫了办公室,拿走了一口袋散币.

sentences.en: This tooth feels very loose.
sentences.cn: 这颗牙感觉松动得厉害。

sentences.en: Two young men were racing motorcycles on the loose gravel.
sentences.cn: 两个小伙子正在松散的砾石路面上赛摩托车。

sentences.en: Wear loose clothing and sensible footwear.
sentences.cn: 穿上宽松的衣服和舒服的鞋子。

sentences.en: Why didn't you tell me she'd been set loose?
sentences.cn: 你干吗不告诉我她已经自由了？

trans.tran_cn: 松动的，零散的，不受束缚的，宽松的，披散的，疏松的，随便的，意义含糊的，放荡的，无球员控制的，稀的
